sentences: Haimanti Sukla (Bengali: হৈমন্তী শুক্লা, Hoimonti Shukla; born 2 December 1949) is a Bengali singer.
She recorded her first song E to kanna noy aamar in 1972.
She was born in present day Sirajganj District, Bangladesh to Pandit Harihar Sukla,  a noted Hindustani classical vocalist.
One of her most notable songs is Amar Bolar Kichu Chilo Na, which was composed by Manna De and released in 1978.
